c74object.name: createproject
c74object.digest: Creates a new project folder from a template.
c74object.description: This object is a utility for automating project setup. When it receives a `create` message with a valid destination path, it creates the specified folder and then recursively copies all files and subfolders from a hardcoded template directory into it.

method.name: create
method.digest: Create a new project directory and copy template files.
method.description:
Send the message `create` followed by a symbol representing the absolute path for the new project folder. The path must use forward slashes (`/`).
**Important Path Requirement:** The direct parent folder of the new project directory must be named exactly `[Projects]`. For example, `D:/.../[Projects]/MyNewProject` is a valid path, but `D:/.../SomeFolder/MyNewProject` is not.
If the path is valid, the object will create the new folder and then copy the entire contents of the template directory (`D:\[Library]\[Audio]\[Works]\[Projects]\[Template]`) into it.

inlet.name: in
inlet.description: Accepts the `create` message followed by the absolute path for the new project.
